message: Hi Bob, here's my proposal: I take $51.28 and you get $48.72. Accepting now secures your share before the 5% discount kicks in next round, matching what you'd expect if negotiations continued. Looking forward to a fair deal!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  Given the inflation, accepting now is better for you than risking a smaller share in later rounds.

Bob, I understand our earlier negotiations haven't worked out, but further delay means we both suffer more from inflation. In round 3, Iâ€™m proposing a fair split: I take $51.28 and you get $48.72. This division reflects our discounted values and is in line with the equilibrium division if we were to continue negotiating. Accepting now secures your share before even more value is lost. Looking forward to your agreement.
